original_title: LAUGFS Gas also to slash prices from tonight
original_body_lines: With the recent decision by LITRO Lanka to reduce the price of a 12.5 kg gas cylinder from tonight, the LAUGFS Gas Company has said today that they are working to lower their prices too.
A senior official of LAUGFS said that the price reduction is expected to come into effect as of midnight today (4).
With the price reduction, the price of 5 kg and 2.3 kg cylinders would also be reduced, he said. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
